attributes.action: Demand the resignation of the Home Secretary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the arrest of Conservative MP Damien Greene,  the Home Secretary must be sacked as ultimately it is her department who allowed this unjust , illegal abuse of police power against an innocent man doing his job.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
